text: Jason DesJarlais is an American football scout and former player and coach. He currently serves as a regional scout for the Jacksonville Jaguars of the National Football League. During the 2003 season, DesJarlais served as the interim head coach at the University of San Diego. DesJarlais played college football at Western Montana College—now known as the University of Montana Western. ==References== Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Living people Category:American football defensive linemen Category:Bates Bobcats football coaches Category:Humboldt State Lumberjacks football coaches Category:Montana Western Bulldogs football coaches Category:Montana Western Bulldogs football players Category:San Diego Toreros football coaches Category:Yale Bulldogs football coaches
title: Jason DesJarlais
